sentences.sentence: Noninflammatory neurologic diseases (NIND) : The CSF of 17 patients were examined, 10 males and 7 females.
sentences.translation: 非炎症性神经疾病组(NIND)；取脑脊液，共17例，男10例，女7例。

sentences.sentence: Fibromuscular dysplasia is a noninflammatory, non atherosclerotic, segmental, multifocal disease of the arteries, mainly involving the medium-sized arteries.
sentences.translation: 纤维肌发育不良是一种非炎症性、非动脉硬化性、节段性、多灶性动脉血管病。
